title: The sweet spot: Scientists discover taste center of human brain

title_detail.value: The sweet spot: Scientists discover taste center of human brain

summary: Using functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) and a new method of statistical analysis, researchers have discovered the taste center in the human brain by uncovering which parts of the brain distinguish different types of tastes.

summary_detail.value: Using functional magnetic resonance imaging (fMRI) and a new method of statistical analysis, researchers have discovered the taste center in the human brain by uncovering which parts of the brain distinguish different types of tastes.
